name: SHRUTHI
info: Shruthi is in charge of our Instagram. She is a practising Vegan and cares deeply about sustainability.

name: URMIL
info: Urmil creates engaging content for us. She runs her own sustainable apparel store with her sister and advocates for slow fashion.
